name: Roasted Veggie Pitas with Avocado Dip
description: Roasted Veggie Pitas with Avocado Dip - super adaptable to any veggies you have on hand - loaded with flavor, and ready in 30 minutes!
keywords: roasted veggie pitas, avocado dip, veggie pitas
recipeIngredient: 1-2 cloves garlic (go for one clove or less if you’re sensitive to strong garlic tastes)
half of a Serrano pepper (more or less depending on how much heat you want)
2 heads cauliflower, cut into small florets
two 14-ounce cans chickpeas, rinsed and drained
cayenne pepper (optional – if you want spicy)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees. Pat the cauliflower and chickpeas dry with paper towels. Arrange in a single layer on one large baking sheet or two baking sheets. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with spices. Give the pan a gentle shake to sort of mix things around. Roast for 15-20 minutes, stir, and roast for an additional 15-20 minutes. The cauliflower and chickpeas should be golden brown and the chickpeas will be semi-crunchy.
recipeInstructions.name: Veggies

recipeInstructions.text: While the veggies are roasting, puree the avocado dip ingredients in a food processor. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Avocado Dip

recipeInstructions.text: Spread each pita with a spoonful of avocado dip and top with roasted veggies. Sprinkle with extra salt, pepper, cilantro, and a dollop of Greek yogurt.
recipeInstructions.name: Assembly
